// Students Completion Request
\u25CF Have you Completed teaching your course syllabus.\n \u25CF Then send Course Completion request to Students.\n \u25CF Inform you Students Through live class to accept your Course Completion Request.
\u25CF You cannot send the completion request to students without completing your course duration.\n \u25CF Completed your course syllabus with in course duration.\n \u25CF To get your share on course fee,minimum 70% of batch students need to approve your course competition request.\n \u25CF No Live classes will be conducted after getting approval from the students to your completion request.
Send Request Name of the student Remark ID ReferralDetails

Refund amount will be added to your dashboard wallet.\n\n By using wallet amount, You can change the trainer for same course or you purchase new course.\n\n You can also withdraw 90 percent of your refunded amount from wallet to your bank account. \n
Note:- Refund will be processed with in first 2 classes only.
